channel.title: Notes on PHYS52015 – Introduction to HPC
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on PHYS52015 – Introduction to HPC

item.title: Introduction and motivation
item.description: Introduction # This course provides a brief introduction to parallel computing. It focuses on those paradigms that are prevalent in scientific computing in academia. There are other parallel programming models which we will mention in passing where appropriate. Task Sign up for a Hamilton account if you don’t already have one. If you have a COSMA account, you can use that instead, and need not sign up for Hamilton access (although you may wish to anyway).
